original_text: Behold, I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions, and over all the power of the enemy: and nothing shall by any means hurt you.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 뱀과 전갈을 밟으며 원수의 모든 능력을 제어할 권능을 주었으니 너희를 해칠 자가 결코 없으리라

sentences.original_text: Behold, I give unto you power
to tread on serpents and scorpions
and over all the power of the enemy
and nothing shall by any means hurt you
